title: Surface Browser
queue_description_with_ai: Web link: Add a web link for Surface Browser to open. Image search: Enter one or more search terms. AI image prompt: Enter terms or instructions to generate AI images.
queue_description_without_ai: Web link: Add a web link for Surface Browser to open. Image search: Enter one or more search terms.
background_text: Refer to {joystick_link}joystick instructions{/link}, {info_link}background{/link} and {cat_link}catalogue essay{/link} (from NESTA, UK) for more information.
sphere_instructions: front, fire button: open selected image (as the sphere rotates, the image closest to the center will appear in colour and will be highlighted with a tunnel if it has a link)
right button: zoom in to surface
to stop rotation: move the joystick in the opposite direction or press the top (hat) button
installation_note: The work can be installed on your computer from www.boxc.net
db_error: An error occurred while retrieving links. Please try again later.
